# textAlignment

**Instance Property**

The alignment of the printed text.

## Declaration

```swift
var textAlignment: NSTextAlignment { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default text alignment is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextAlignment/UITextAlignmentLeft].

## Text attributes for printed content

- **font**: The font of the printed text.
- **color**: The color of the printed text.
